predicate.note: Frames file for 'dispense' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'distribute' and 'end'.

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to end

example.name: from the corpus
example.text: RJR's executives have said they will dispense with certain brands, in particular, that aren't leaders in their markets.
example.arg: certain brands , in particular , that aren't leaders in their markets

example.name: made up
example.text: John dispensed bad advice to passers-by.
